alert.note: Alert for Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Baca County through 645 PM MDT... At 550 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of developing strong thunderstorms 7 miles northwest of Campo, or 14 miles south of Springfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walsh, Pritchett, Vilas, Campo and Two Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
